renderable
Class BlockControlLabel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JLabel
                  renderable.BlockControlLabel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollapseLabel, CommentLabel
 class BlockControlLabel
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener

BlockControlLabel is a basic Label that exists on a given block that is used to control a property that may be toggled between two states. This class should be extended to handle the particular states that are toggled.
